Package edu.hadassah.uist.album.photo.app.listeners

Class Summary
AImportPhotoListener Base listener class for import operations
ImportFolderPhotoListener Listener class for import folder operation
ImportPhotoListener Listener class for import single file
LigthFrameComponentListener Listener for changing menu item label according to the component status
MouseGestureListener Listener of the mouse gestures
NextPhotoListener This listener shows next or previous photo component according to pressed button, or recognized gesture
PhotoFileFilter Filter of the file extensions for import file dialog
RemarkDrawListener Listener of the remarks (annotations)
StatusBarUpdater Listener for updates of the status bar
TagMediatorUpdaterListener Update mediator with selected tags of the IPhotoComponent
TagModelUpdateListener Listener to update PhotoModel with selected tag
TagUIUpdateListener Update UI with selected tags of the IPhotoComponent
